description: Cumulative patch through roundN_plus93: fixes MSVC shadowing warnings and exposes Game::describeAt for UI tooltips (minimap cursor info).
summary: Fix MSVC C4456 warnings by renaming shadowing locals in save migration and isometric phantom rendering.
Expose Game::describeAt as a public UI helper so renderer can show minimap cursor tile descriptions without friending internal helpers.
Unblock MSVC build by resolving private-member access error in render minimap tooltip code.
notes: This patch is intentionally small but critical: it restores MSVC builds and enables the new minimap cursor info line to compile.
No gameplay balance changes; only UI helper exposure and warning cleanups.
